scripts.export:docs: node -e "const fs=require('fs');const path=require('path');const dest=path.join(__dirname,'..');['404.html','index.html','projects','notes','cv','_next','favicon.ico'].forEach(name=>fs.rmSync(path.join(dest,name),{recursive:true,force:true}));" && next build --turbopack && node -e "const fs=require('fs');const path=require('path');const src=path.join(__dirname,'out');const dest=path.join(__dirname,'..');fs.cpSync(src,dest,{recursive:true});console.log('Exported to docs/');"
